en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit New Delhi, India, from February 14 to 16 to attend the Asia Pacific International Mediation Summit co-organised by the American Bar Association Dispute Resolution Section and the Regional Centre for Asia and the Pacific of the United Nations Commission on International Trade Law (UNCITRAL).
Mr Yuen will deliver a keynote speech at the summit on February 15 to promote Hong Kong's international legal and dispute resolution services.

He will meet with the Secretary of UNCITRAL, Mr Renaud Sorieul, and the Minister for Law and Justice of India, Mr Shri D V Sadananda Gowda, to exchange views on matters of mutual interest. He will also call on the Chinese Ambassador to India, Mr Le Yucheng.
In addition, he will visit the Delhi International Arbitration Centre to enhance co-operation and exchanges with India's legal and dispute resolution sector.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the morning of February 17.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師將於二月十四日至十六日訪問印度新德里，出席由美國律師協會爭議解決處和聯合國國際貿易法委員會亞洲及太平洋區域中心聯合主辦的亞洲太平洋國際調解峰會。
袁國強將於二月十五日在峰會發表主題演說，推廣香港的國際法律和解決爭議服務。
他將與聯合國國際貿易法委員會秘書長Renaud Sorieul及印度司法部長Shri D V Sadananda Gowda會面，就雙方關注的議題交換意見。他亦會拜訪中國駐印度大使樂玉成。
此外，他會到訪德里國際仲裁中心，加強與印度法律和解決爭議界的合作和交流。
袁國強將於二月十七日上午返港。
